Posts.Content: LiveToLove wrote: I'm new to the site, and learning from all of you. This is my first post.  After more than two months on Faslodex, my oncologist started me on Xeloda.  My malignant pleural effusion had started in the left lung, after a pleurodesis on my right lung.  The oncologist's suggestion is to stop Faslodex. Has anyone out there continued Faslodex while on Xeloda?  Dx 8/2005, 2cm, Stage IIB, 6/25 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 8/31/2005 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel, Underarm/Axillary Chemotherapy 9/30/2005 AC + T (Taxol) Radiation Therapy 1/16/2006 Breast, Lymph nodes Hormonal Therapy 4/30/2006 Femara (letrozole) Dx 7/2014, Stage IV, ER+/PR+, HER2- Hormonal Therapy 8/10/2014 Faslodex (fulvestrant) Chemotherapy 10/13/2014 Xeloda (capecitabine) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Xeloda and Faslodex LiveToLove blainejennifer
